channel.title: Shooting – GAME ONLINE
channel.description: GAME ACRADE - HTML5 FREE PLAY ONLINE

item.title: Bottle Shooter
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Shoot the bottles. Click on the cylinder to reload.
item.content:encoded: Shoot the bottles. Click on the cylinder to reload.

item.title: Merge Gun: Fps Shooting Zombie
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Merge Gun: Fps Shooting Zombie is a strategy defense game. Your main mission is to shoot down all coming undead creatures before they kill you. Before you join the battle, you can buy more guns and merge the same guns into new advanced ones.On PC and MobileTap and drag on the home page = move […]
item.content:encoded:
Merge Gun: Fps Shooting Zombie is a strategy defense game. Your main mission is to shoot down all coming undead creatures before they kill you. Before you join the battle, you can buy more guns and merge the same guns into new advanced ones.
On PC and MobileTap and drag on the home page = move the guns and mergeHold and swipe = aim with the crosshairClick = fire

item.title: Shooting World – Gun Fire
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Shooting World – Gun Fire is a skillful 3D FPS game. Use your weapon to aim and shoot various targets to get higher scores. Simple and unique gun control experience, aiming and shooting at the targets can be done easily with one hand.PC & MobileHold to aim, release to fire
item.content:encoded:
Shooting World – Gun Fire is a skillful 3D FPS game. Use your weapon to aim and shoot various targets to get higher scores. Simple and unique gun control experience, aiming and shooting at the targets can be done easily with one hand.
PC & MobileHold to aim, release to fire

item.title: Gun Evolution
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Gun Evolution is a shooting arcade game. With 3D cartoon models, you need to merge a power gun to win the battle after the finish line at each level.On PC and MobileHold and swipe = move the guns
item.content:encoded:
Gun Evolution is a shooting arcade game. With 3D cartoon models, you need to merge a power gun to win the battle after the finish line at each level.
On PC and MobileHold and swipe = move the guns

item.title: Mineblock Gun Shooting
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Mineblock Gun Shooting is a first-person shooting simulation game. All models are made of pixel blocks including scenes, characters, and weapons. We have 4v4 Team Mode, Individual Mode, and Sniper Mode for you to select.On PCWASD = move1234 = switch weaponsSpace = jumpR = reloadOn MobileDrag the wheel = moveTap buttons = interact with weapons
item.content:encoded:
Mineblock Gun Shooting is a first-person shooting simulation game. All models are made of pixel blocks including scenes, characters, and weapons. We have 4v4 Team Mode, Individual Mode, and Sniper Mode for you to select.
On PCWASD = move1234 = switch weaponsSpace = jumpR = reloadOn MobileDrag the wheel = moveTap buttons = interact with weapons

item.title: Train Shooting
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Train Shooting is an exciting 3D first-person shooter game. The Eagle Special Forces are the most awesome military force. You have a gun that can be shot an unlimited number of times. Your mission is to cross the train, kill all enemies, find your captain, and successfully rescue him, sometimes you can also find treasure.PC […]
item.content:encoded:
Train Shooting is an exciting 3D first-person shooter game. The Eagle Special Forces are the most awesome military force. You have a gun that can be shot an unlimited number of times. Your mission is to cross the train, kill all enemies, find your captain, and successfully rescue him, sometimes you can also find treasure.
PC & MobileMouse click or tap to shoot

item.title: Survivor Kingdoms
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Survivor Kingdoms is a typical roguelike survival game. Your character will shoot and reload when she sees any targets. The longer you survive, the more powerful zombies you will meet. Don’t forget to attack the red oil vans to destroy a group of zombies on the ground!On PCWASD = moveTap = dashDrag the crossfire = […]
item.content:encoded:
Survivor Kingdoms is a typical roguelike survival game. Your character will shoot and reload when she sees any targets. The longer you survive, the more powerful zombies you will meet. Don’t forget to attack the red oil vans to destroy a group of zombies on the ground!
On PCWASD = moveTap = dashDrag the crossfire = aimOn MobileThe joystick on the screenTap the blue button = dashDrag the crossfire = aim

item.title: Johnny Trigger Sniper
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Johnny Trigger Sniper is a first-person shooter game. You travel through various cities as a sniper who upholds the city’s justice. Your mission is to kill the criminals within a limited time while keeping the hostages safe. Unlock and collect M74, 98K, and other sniper rifles, join us Save the hostages, and become the army’s […]
item.content:encoded:
Johnny Trigger Sniper is a first-person shooter game. You travel through various cities as a sniper who upholds the city’s justice. Your mission is to kill the criminals within a limited time while keeping the hostages safe. Unlock and collect M74, 98K, and other sniper rifles, join us Save the hostages, and become the army’s top sniper!
PC & MobileSlide to aim, release to shoot

item.title: Sharpshooter Blitz
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Sharpshooter Blitz is a first-person shooting arcade game. Your mission is to shoot down all enemy targets at each level. Enemy targets will make attack behavior but will not hurt you. So keep calm and shoot first with headshots.On PC and MobileDrag and swipe = aimRelease = shoot
item.content:encoded:
Sharpshooter Blitz is a first-person shooting arcade game. Your mission is to shoot down all enemy targets at each level. Enemy targets will make attack behavior but will not hurt you. So keep calm and shoot first with headshots.
On PC and MobileDrag and swipe = aimRelease = shoot

item.title: Last Day On Earth: Zombie Shooting
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Last Day on Earth: Zombie Shooting is a 2D side-scrolling survival RPG shooting game. Zombies occupy the whole city. You need to recruit the last survivors to fight against zombies for a living. As humans, you need weapons, ammo, food, and medicines. Send your teammates to dispatch different buildings, go to complete the tasks in […]
item.content:encoded:
Last Day on Earth: Zombie Shooting is a 2D side-scrolling survival RPG shooting game. Zombies occupy the whole city. You need to recruit the last survivors to fight against zombies for a living. As humans, you need weapons, ammo, food, and medicines. Send your teammates to dispatch different buildings, go to complete the tasks in this fallen town.
On PCAD = moveJ = shootS = flipK = switch weaponsOn MobileDrag the wheel = moveTap the buttons on the screen = interact
